effects.1: No one would believe a human body could be crushed into a puddle.
effects.2: Your dead flesh hangs like a wet red blanket over your shattered skeleton.
effects.3: Your skull is crushed like an eggshell, cerebral fluid leaking out like yolk.
effects.4: Your rib cage’s collapse leads to an agonizing death gasping for air from ruptured lungs.
effects.5: Crushed bones and splattered brains betray your grisly end.
effects.6: A bone-shattering wound reveals your harsh demise.

effects.1: Your dead flesh hangs like a wet red blanket over your shattered skeleton.
effects.2: Your skull is crushed like an eggshell, cerebral fluid leaking out like yolk.
effects.3: Your rib cage collapsed, leading to an agonizing death gasping for air from ruptured lungs.
effects.4: Crushed bones and splattered brains betray your grisly end.
effects.5: A bone-shattering wound reveals your harsh demise.
effects.6: Your corpse is largely and intact and ready for a noble funeral.

condition_recovery: You are mortally wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 round. If you are healed, you need 1 month of bed rest.

effects.1: The bone-crushing impact drives you into a coma; you are alive but permanently unconscious and will starve unless force-fed.
effects.2: Your spine is broken at the neck (paralyzed, cannot move, fight, use items, or cast spells, Death save each month or die from complications).
effects.3: Both your legs are crushed and must be amputated (DEX reduced to 3 for AC purposes, two crutches required, movement reduced by 60’, cannot force march).
effects.4: Both your arms are crushed and must be amputated (cannot climb, use weapons or items, open locks, remove traps, or similar actions)
effects.5: You are permanently addled by a blow to the head (-2 on magical research and proficiency throws, -10% penalty on earned XP).
effects.6: Your jaw is irreparably broken, and all your teeth pulverized (cannot speak clearly, cast spells, or use magic items involving speech, -4 to reaction rolls)

condition_recovery: You are grievously wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 turn. If you are healed, you need 2 weeks of bed rest.

effects.1: Your spine is shattered at the waist (as per legs crushed, cannot reproduce, and must make Death save each year or die from complications).
effects.2: Both your legs are lamed by bad breaks (crutch required, movement reduced by 60’, DEX reduced by 2/3 for AC purposes).
effects.3: One of your legs is crushed and must be amputated (crutch is required, movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes).
effects.4: One of your arms is crushed and must be amputated (cannot climb, use shields, dual wield, or use two-handed weapon)
effects.5: A skull-shaking blow leaves you partly deaf and suffering ear-ringing head-aches (-2 to Listening throws, -2 to surprise rolls, -1 initiative).
effects.6: 3d6 teeth are broken inward by a forceful blow, leaving you slurring and gap-toothed (-4 to all reaction rolls, -1 to initiative when  spellcasting)

condition_recovery: You are critically wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 day. If you are healed, you need 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: Your shattered ribs press on your lungs, causing constant fatigue and pain (must rest for 2 turns every 6, wilderness movement reduced by 1/3, cannot force march, CON reduced by 1/3)
effects.2: One of your legs is lamed by a bad break (movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes)
effects.3: One of your knees is damaged (normal load reduced by 6 stone, cannot force march).
effects.4: One of your hands is crushed and must be amputated (cannot dual-wield or use two-handed weapons)
effects.5: One of your ear drums is popped, partially deafening you (-1 to Listening throws, -1 to surprise rolls).
effects.6: 1d6 of your teeth are knocked out (-2 to reaction rolls with opposite sex and upper-class NPCs).

condition_recovery: You are in shock. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing and one night of bed rest, or 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: Your nose is flattened, cheek crushed, and ear turned to cauliflower (gruesome scarring)
effects.2: Scrotum crushed or womb ruptured (cannot reproduce, -3 to reaction rolls if loss of manhood / womanhood is known)
effects.3: Your hips are fractured and the break heals poorly (cannot force march).
effects.4: 1d3 fingers one hand are smashed into bloody pulp. (3 lost fingers on one hand makes hand useless.)
effects.5: Your ear is turned to cauliflower (minor scarring).
effects.6: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were knocked out. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing or one night of bed rest.

effects.1: A broken rib heals badly and it aches when you move too fast (-1 to all initiative rolls).
effects.2: 1d3 toes on one foot smashed into bloody pulp. (3 lost toes on one foot makes leg lame).
effects.3: The wrenching blow leaves you with lower back pain (normal load reduced by 3 stone).
effects.4: 1d3 nails on a hand are blackened & ruinous (minor scarring).
effects.5: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.6: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were just dazed. You recover immediately with 1hp. You do not need any bed rest.

effects.1: Your bones ache in bad weather (-1 to initiative in Frigid, Drizzly, or Rainy weather).
effects.2: Your nose is flattened and ear turned to cauliflower (notable scarring).
effects.4: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.5: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.
effects.6: The Choosers of the Slain pass you by, and you awaken.
